item.title: OCaml Weekly News, 06 Sep 2022
item.description:
1. Day of the Camel 2022: OCaml in Academia and Industry (online, 9 September 2022)
  2. Advice for combining multiple monads
  3. New OCaml meetup group in Toulouse (in French)
  4. GADTs for tracking dimensions of multidimensional arrays?
  5. ocaml-eris 1.0.0 - Encoding for Robust Immutable Storage (ERIS) (+ Using Zig code compiled to WebAssembly from OCaml)
  6. OCamlverse updates
  7. Diskuv OCaml 1.x.x; Windows OCaml installer no longer in preview
  8. Does OCaml infer types between files?
  9. Other OCaml News
